ess,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"bountyAmount":"The credit."}},"QuestCompleted(address,uint8,uint32,uint256,bool,bool)":{"params":{"hardMode":"Whether the quest was completed in hard mode.","player":"The player who completed the streak."}},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted on transfer, mint (from=0), and burn (to=0)."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"affiliateQuestReward(address,uint256)":{"details":"Access: affiliate contract only. Routes through coin contract to enforce access.","params":{"amount":"The base amount for quest calculation.","player":"The player who triggered the affiliate action."},"returns":{"questReward":"The bonus reward earned (if any quest completed)."}},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Standard ERC20 approve. Setting to type(uint256).max indicates infinite approval.","params":{"amount":"The maximum amount that can be spent.","spender":"The address authorized to spend."},"returns":{"_0":"True on success."}},"burnCoin(address,uint256)":{"details":"Access: DegenerusGame, NFT, or affiliate.      Used for purchases, fees, and affiliate utilities.      Reverts on zero address or insufficient balance.","params":{"amount":"The amount to burn (18 decimals).","target":"The address to burn from."}},"claimPresale()":{"details":"Deprecated: presale rewards are paid immediately; this is typically a no-op."},"claimableCoin()":{"details":"Does not include pending stakes, only resolved winning days.","returns":{"_0":"The total BURNIE claimable from past winning coinflips."}},"coinflipAmount(address)":{"params":{"player":"The player address to query."},"returns":{"_0":"The stake amount for the current target day (18 decimals)."}},"coinflipAmountLastDay(address)":{"details":"This is the prior day relative to `_targetFlipDay()` (since stakes always target the next day).      Useful for UIs showing \"last day's bet\" that is now being resolved.","params":{"player":"The player address to query."},"returns":{"_0":"The stake amount from the previous day (18 decimals)."}},"coinflipTop(uint24)":{"details":"Reads the level-keyed leaderboard entry.","params":{"lvl":"The game level to query."},"returns":{"player":"The address of the top bettor for this level.","score":"The top stake in whole BURNIE tokens."}},"coinflipTopLastDay()":{"details":"Mirrors `coinflipAmountLastDay()` but returns the top address + score for that day.","returns":{"player":"The address of the top bettor for yesterday.","score":"The top stake in whole BURNIE tokens."}},"creditFlip(address,uint256)":{"details":"Zero address or zero amount is a no-op.      Does NOT arm bounty (canArmBounty=false) - only direct deposits can set records.","params":{"amount":"The stake amount to add (18 decimals).","player":"The player to credit."}},"creditFlipBatch(address[3],uint256[3])":{"details":"Gas optimization for crediting multiple players in one transaction.      Zero addresses or amounts are skipped.","params":{"amounts":"Array of 3 stake amounts (18 decimals each).","players":"Array of 3 player addresses."}},"creditLinkReward(address,uint256)":{"details":"Admin-only. Mints directly to player's balance (not as flip stake).      Used for promotional rewards funded by LINK token proceeds.","params":{"amount":"The amount to mint (18 decimals).","player":"The recipient address."}},"decimatorBurn(uint256)":{"details":"SECURITY: Burns BEFORE downstream calls (CEI pattern).      Quest rewards are added to the base amount before bucket calculation.      Bucket determines jackpot weight (lower = better odds).","params":{"amount":"Amount (18 decimals) to burn; must satisfy MIN (100 BURNIE)."}},"depositCoinflip(uint256)":{"details":"Zero-amount calls act as cash-out of pending winnings without adding new stake.      SECURITY: Burns BEFORE downstream calls (CEI pattern) to prevent reentrancy.      Locked during level jackpot resolution to prevent stake manipulation.","params":{"amount":"Amount (18 decimals) to burn; must satisfy MIN (100 BURNIE), or zero for cash-out."}},"getActiveQuests()":{"returns":{"quests":"Array of 2 QuestInfo structs with quest details."}},"getPlayerQuestView(address)":{"params":{"player":"The player address to query."},"returns":{"viewData":"Structured view with all quest-related player data."}},"normalizeActiveBurnQuests()":{"details":"Access: game contract only. Called when game state transition invalidates burn quests."},"notifyQuestBond(address,uint256)":{"details":"Access: ContractAddresses.BONDS contract only. Credits quest rewards as flip stakes.","params":{"basePerBondWei":"The ETH value per bond (for quest threshold calculation).","player":"The player who purchased ContractAddresses.BONDS."}},"notifyQuestBurn(address,uint32)":{"details":"Access: game contract only. Credits quest rewards as flip stakes.","params":{"player":"The player who burned NFTs.","quantity":"Number of NFTs burned."}},"notifyQuestMint(address,uint32,bool)":{"details":"Access: NFT contract only. Credits quest rewards as flip stakes.","params":{"paidWithEth":"Whether the mint was paid with ETH (vs BURNIE).","player":"The player who minted.","quantity":"Number of NFTs minted."}},"playerQuestStates(address)":{"params":{"player":"The player address to query."},"returns":{"completed":"Completion status for each of the 2 active quests.","lastCompletedDay":"The day index of their last quest completion.","progress":"Progress values for each of the 2 active quests.","streak":"Current completion streak count."}},"processCoinflipPayouts(uint24,bool,uint256,uint48)":{"details":"Called by DegenerusGame; runs in three phases per settlement:      1. Record the flip resolution day for the level being processed.      2. Arm bounties on the first payout window.      3. Perform cleanup and reopen betting (flip claims happen lazily per player).      PAYOUT DISTRIBUTION (bonus on top of principal):      \u2022 5% chance of 50% bonus (150% total) (roll == 0)      \u2022 5% chance of 150% bonus (250% total) (roll == 1)      \u2022 90% chance of [78%, 115%] bonus (178%-215% total)      \u2022 +6% if bonusFlip is true (last day bonus)","params":{"bonusFlip":"Adds 6 percentage points to the payout roll for the last flip of the purchase phase.","epoch":"The day index being resolved.","level":"Current DegenerusGame level (used to gate 1/run and propagate flip stakes).","rngWord":"VRF-sourced random word for determining outcome."},"returns":{"finished":"True when all payouts and cleanup are complete (always true)."}},"rollDailyQuest(uint48,uint256)":{"details":"Access: game contract only. Emits DailyQuestRolled for each quest type.","params":{"day":"The day index to roll for.","entropy":"VRF-sourced randomness for quest selection."}},"rollDailyQuestWithOverrides(uint48,uint256,bool,bool)":{"details":"Access: game contract only. Used when game state requires specific quest types.","params":{"day":"The day index to roll for.","entropy":"VRF-sourced randomness.","forceBurn":"Force a burn quest type.","forceMintEth":"Force a mint-with-ETH quest type."}},"supplyIncUncirculated()":{"details":"Used by ContractAddresses.VAULT share calculations and dashboards.","returns":{"_0":"The sum of circulating supply + virtual ContractAddresses.VAULT reserve."}},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Standard ERC20 transfer. Reverts on insufficient balance.","params":{"amount":"The amount to transfer (18 decimals).","to":"The recipient address."},"returns":{"_0":"True on success."}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Standard ERC20 transferFrom with game-contract bypass.      SECURITY: DegenerusGame can transfer without approval (trusted contract pattern).      This enables seamless gameplay transactions without pre-approval steps.","params":{"amount":"The amount to transfer (18 decimals).","from":"The source address.","to":"The destination address."},"returns":{"_0":"True on success."}},"vaultEscrow(uint256)":{"details":"Access: ContractAddresses.VAULT, ContractAddresses.BONDS, or game when routing coin share without touching the ContractAddresses.VAULT.      This increases the \"paper\" reserve that ContractAddresses.VAULT can later mint from.","params":{"amount":"The amount of virtual BURNIE to add to the allowance."}},"vaultMintAllowance()":{"details":"Exposed for the ContractAddresses.VAULT share math and external dashboards.","returns":{"_0":"The current ContractAddresses.VAULT mint allowance in BURNIE (18 decimals)."}},"vaultMintTo(address,uint256)":{"details":"Access: ContractAddresses.VAULT only. Converts virtual reserve into circulating supply.      Reverts if amount exceeds available allowance.","params":{"amount":"The amount to mint (18 decimals).","to":"The recipient address."}}},"stateVariables":{"BPS_DENOMINATOR":{"details":"Basis points denominator for percentage calculations (100.00%)."},"COINFLIP_EXTRA_MIN_PERCENT":{"details":"Base percentage for normal coinflip payouts (non-extreme outcomes).      Range: [78, 78+37] = [78%, 115%] when added to principal."},"COINFLIP_EXTRA_RANGE":{"details":"Range width for coinflip payout randomization: min + (rng % 38) => [78..115]."},"COIN_CLAIM_DAYS":{"details":"Maximum number of past days a player can claim coinflip winnings.      After 30 days, unclaimed winnings expire (stakes are forfeit)."},"DECIMATOR_BUCKET":{"details":"Base bucket denominator for decimator weighting.      Lower bucket = more valuable. Adjusted based on level and streak."},"JACKPOT_RESET_TIME":{"details":"Unix timestamp anchor for day indexing (defines day 0 boundary).      All coinflip days are calculated relative to this anchor."},"MAX_BAF_BRACKET":{"details":"Maximum BAF (Biggest Active Flip) bracket level.      Levels are grouped into brackets of 10 for leaderboard tracking."},"MIN":{"details":"Minimum amount for coinflip deposits and decimator burns (100 BURNIE).      Prevents dust attacks and meaningless micro-stakes."},"PRICE_COIN_UNIT":{"details":"1000 BURNIE - used for bounty accumulation and top-flip rewards."},"_vaultMintAllowance":{"custom:security":"Only ContractAddresses.VAULT/ContractAddresses.BONDS/game can increase; only ContractAddresses.VAULT can mint from it.","details":"Seeded to 2,000,000 BURNIE. Increases via vaultEscrow(), decreases via vaultMintTo().      supplyIncUncirculated = totalSupply + _vaultMintAllowance."},"allowance":{"details":"type(uint256).max indicates infinite approval."},"balanceOf":{"details":"Standard ERC20 balance mapping."},"biggestFlipEver":{"details":"Updated when a new record is set. Used as threshold for arming bounty.      Frozen during RNG lock to prevent manipulation."},"bountyOwedTo":{"details":"Cleared after payout. Only one player can hold bounty right at a time."},"coinflipBalance":{"details":"Key: day index (from JACKPOT_RESET_TIME anchor) => player => stake.      Cleared on claim. Cannot be modified once day <= flipsClaimableDay."},"coinflipDayResult":{"details":"Key: day index. Value: (rewardPercent, win). Set once by processCoinflipPayouts()."},"coinflipTopByDay":{"details":"Key: day index. Value: (player, score in whole tokens).      Reset implicitly each new day."},"coinflipTopByLevel":{"details":"Key: game level. Value: (player, score in whole tokens).      Updated on each addFlip() call."},"currentBounty":{"details":"Increases by 1000 BURNIE each coinflip window. Half paid on armed player's win.      Wraps on overflow (effectively resets to small value)."},"decimals":{"details":"18 decimals (standard ERC20). 1 BURNIE = 1e18 base units."},"flipsClaimableDay":{"details":"Advances each time processCoinflipPayouts() is called.      Active betting day = flipsClaimableDay + 1 (via _targetFlipDay)."},"lastCoinflipClaim":{"details":"Used to determine claim range in _claimCoinflipsInternal()."},"topFlipRewardPaid":{"details":"Key: game level. Value: true if bonus already paid. One-time per level."},"totalSupply":{"details":"Increases on mint, decreases on burn. Always equals sum of all balanceOf entries."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AmountLTMin()":[{"notice":"Deposit/burn amount is below the minimum threshold (100 BURNIE)."}],"CoinflipLocked()":[{"notice":"Coinflip deposits are locked during level jackpot resolution."}],"Insufficient()":[{"notice":"Requested amount exceeds available balance or allowance."}],"NotDecimatorWindow()":[{"notice":"Decimator burn attempted outside an active decimator window."}],"OnlyAdmin()":[{"notice":"Caller is not the ContractAddresses.ADMIN address."}],"OnlyAffiliate()":[{"notice":"Caller is not the authorized affiliate contract."}],"OnlyBonds()":[{"notice":"Caller is not the authorized ContractAddresses.BONDS b10bd5377","dweb:/ipfs/Qmf1Y81X46oc18Ceer2ixeu58gsrGgGgVd9qGkKMFcx4Xt"]},"contracts/interfaces/DegenerusGameModuleInterfaces.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2cce73e9b967eab0a785aa1b8fb16b894b3735770f77dbe47e04d7c08f81639b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b9aaf8031f1b806a930a506ce6697ad110f3af096e103f4846a998d76883d694","dweb:/ipfs/QmaCfQsBTNQ6fTMgTAXm4qTBU3amXMgiHVzUwi5YPSGgP1"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusAffiliate.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8e8fe05167caa89f3b1a42095c2df53871c40625e6f720a050d1fb3d51a940a8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://04b1e64f0f6b86005186cfa58548c56c63a3f998416bdb6326b0ede3145937d8","dweb:/ipfs/QmQmQbLWw6rrcRjrH4JkQKMnpoqVaTkwfXYaTVG7vh2UXT"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusCoin.sol":{"keccak256":"0xddadbbfc0c222965dd7047835a69664d7d7568a278fe5a2e5ff87985795bee8b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c8cfb5b790a6b2f2cb194c35e4260308b8d8bfee9d916a6e35ac6d91dc9d7312","dweb:/ipfs/QmNmQNtxECyZU5qXKtR4QhVxyW6onKkau74RnBRYxu3rCG"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusGame.sol":{"keccak256":"0x33f8ea9d37555cae770ea20f7aebd410e82d081a186a8d9c6c0b8381f7bd2bec","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2d8c9a757219252f2aa9387e643c4e4e24c913ceffb54cc97e0ee89bcd31cf43","dweb:/ipfs/QmUZ2jsGxb818X9DZBvXzT9SXbw8ASk3QwYXtPfkwNCB9M"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusJackpots.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcabbdec4f6b515c482e4106bc8e6ee1924e827750ea4d2ea82f633df875d2856","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6eb731745962fe9894a44a23f3529e73a285a21fdaca4bc1b81e45afe1d81507","dweb:/ipfs/QmcZdp6aYJ9bofWJd5miYXivTy5rFcPzp5PzpyCxwUG7tA"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusQuests.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8a46f42776972539d9b0cf0d331b4b574b6abf9097e01f96ebdca1ce6df7a517","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fe2e12f4b5ff50ffa1051620ae1f8fa6526b34bcbafe9a58c9a8f8b7e7e1f809","dweb:/ipfs/QmQxQNPhqtRiNQQkSNC6haM1Y3prvdAK5DQrt5m7f3qApn"]}},"version":1}

affiliateQuestReward(address,uint256).details: Access: affiliate contract only. Routes through coin contract to enforce access.

params.amount: The base amount for quest calculation.
params.player: The player who triggered the affiliate action.

returns.questReward: The bonus reward earned (if any quest completed).

approve(address,uint256).details: Standard ERC20 approve. Setting to type(uint256).max indicates infinite approval.

params.amount: The maximum amount that can be spent.

burnCoin(address,uint256).details: Access: DegenerusGame, NFT, or affiliate.      Used for purchases, fees, and affiliate utilities.      Reverts on zero address or insufficient balance.

claimPresale().details: Deprecated: presale rewards are paid immediately; this is typically a no-op.

claimableCoin().details: Does not include pending stakes, only resolved winning days.

returns._0: The total BURNIE claimable from past winning coinflips.
The stake amount for the current target day (18 decimals).

coinflipAmountLastDay(address).details: This is the prior day relative to `_targetFlipDay()` (since stakes always target the next day).      Useful for UIs showing "last day's bet" that is now being resolved.

returns._0: The stake amount from the previous day (18 decimals).

returns.player: The address of the top bettor for this level.
returns.score: The top stake in whole BURNIE tokens.

coinflipTopLastDay().details: Mirrors `coinflipAmountLastDay()` but returns the top address + score for that day.

returns.player: The address of the top bettor for yesterday.
returns.score: The top stake in whole BURNIE tokens.

creditFlip(address,uint256).details: Zero address or zero amount is a no-op.      Does NOT arm bounty (canArmBounty=false) - only direct deposits can set records.

params.amount: The stake amount to add (18 decimals).

creditFlipBatch(address[3],uint256[3]).details: Gas optimization for crediting multiple players in one transaction.      Zero addresses or amounts are skipped.

params.amounts: Array of 3 stake amounts (18 decimals each).

creditLinkReward(address,uint256).details: Admin-only. Mints directly to player's balance (not as flip stake).      Used for promotional rewards funded by LINK token proceeds.

decimatorBurn(uint256).details: SECURITY: Burns BEFORE downstream calls (CEI pattern).      Quest rewards are added to the base amount before bucket calculation.      Bucket determines jackpot weight (lower = better odds).

params.amount: Amount (18 decimals) to burn; must satisfy MIN (100 BURNIE).

depositCoinflip(uint256).details: Zero-amount calls act as cash-out of pending winnings without adding new stake.      SECURITY: Burns BEFORE downstream calls (CEI pattern) to prevent reentrancy.      Locked during level jackpot resolution to prevent stake manipulation.

params.amount: Amount (18 decimals) to burn; must satisfy MIN (100 BURNIE), or zero for cash-out.

returns.quests: Array of 2 QuestInfo structs with quest details.

returns.viewData: Structured view with all quest-related player data.

normalizeActiveBurnQuests().details: Access: game contract only. Called when game state transition invalidates burn quests.

notifyQuestBond(address,uint256).details: Access: ContractAddresses.BONDS contract only. Credits quest rewards as flip stakes.

params.basePerBondWei: The ETH value per bond (for quest threshold calculation).

notifyQuestBurn(address,uint32).details: Access: game contract only. Credits quest rewards as flip stakes.

notifyQuestMint(address,uint32,bool).details: Access: NFT contract only. Credits quest rewards as flip stakes.

params.paidWithEth: Whether the mint was paid with ETH (vs BURNIE).

returns.completed: Completion status for each of the 2 active quests.
returns.lastCompletedDay: The day index of their last quest completion.
returns.progress: Progress values for each of the 2 active quests.

processCoinflipPayouts(uint24,bool,uint2.details: Called by DegenerusGame; runs in three phases per settlement:      1. Record the flip resolution day for the level being processed.      2. Arm bounties on the first payout window.      3. Perform cleanup and reopen betting (flip claims happen lazily per player).      PAYOUT DISTRIBUTION (bonus on top of principal):       5% chance of 50% bonus (150% total) (roll == 0)       5% chance of 150% bonus (250% total) (roll == 1)       90% chance of [78%, 115%] bonus (178%-215% total)       +6% if bonusFlip is true (last day bonus)

params.bonusFlip: Adds 6 percentage points to the payout roll for the last flip of the purchase phase.
params.level: Current DegenerusGame level (used to gate 1/run and propagate flip stakes).
params.rngWord: VRF-sourced random word for determining outcome.

returns.finished: True when all payouts and cleanup are complete (always true).

rollDailyQuest(uint48,uint256).details: Access: game contract only. Emits DailyQuestRolled for each quest type.

params.day: The day index to roll for.

rollDailyQuestWithOverrides(uint48,uint2.details: Access: game contract only. Used when game state requires specific quest types.

params.day: The day index to roll for.

supplyIncUncirculated().details: Used by ContractAddresses.VAULT share calculations and dashboards.

returns._0: The sum of circulating supply + virtual ContractAddresses.VAULT reserve.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Standard ERC20 transfer. Reverts on insufficient balance.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Standard ERC20 transferFrom with game-contract bypass.      SECURITY: DegenerusGame can transfer without approval (trusted contract pattern).      This enables seamless gameplay transactions without pre-approval steps.

vaultEscrow(uint256).details: Access: ContractAddresses.VAULT, ContractAddresses.BONDS, or game when routing coin share without touching the ContractAddresses.VAULT.      This increases the "paper" reserve that ContractAddresses.VAULT can later mint from.

params.amount: The amount of virtual BURNIE to add to the allowance.

vaultMintAllowance().details: Exposed for the ContractAddresses.VAULT share math and external dashboards.

returns._0: The current ContractAddresses.VAULT mint allowance in BURNIE (18 decimals).

vaultMintTo(address,uint256).details: Access: ContractAddresses.VAULT only. Converts virtual reserve into circulating supply.      Reverts if amount exceeds available allowance.

affiliateQuestReward(address,uint256).notice: Compute affiliate quest rewards while preserving quest module access control.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` tokens on behalf of caller.

biggestFlipEver().notice: All-time record for biggest coinflip stake.

burnCoin(address,uint256).notice: Burn BURNIE from `target` during gameplay/affiliate flows.

claimableCoin().notice: View-only helper to estimate claimable coin (flips only) for the caller.

coinflipAmount(address).notice: Get a player's coinflip stake for the current betting window.

coinflipAmountLastDay(address).notice: Return the player's coinflip stake for the most recently opened day window.

coinflipTop(uint24).notice: Return the top coinflip bettor recorded for a given level.

coinflipTopLastDay().notice: Return the top coinflip bettor for the most recently opened day window.

creditFlip(address,uint256).notice: Credit a coinflip stake from authorized contracts (game, NFT, affiliate, ContractAddresses.BONDS).

creditFlipBatch(address[3],uint256[3]).notice: Batch credit up to three flip stakes in a single call.

creditLinkReward(address,uint256).notice: Credit LINK-funded bonus directly (ContractAddresses.ADMIN-triggered, not presale).

currentBounty().notice: Current bounty pool size in BURNIE (18 decimals).

decimals().notice: Number of decimal places for BURNIE token.

decimatorBurn(uint256).notice: Burn BURNIE during an active Decimator window to accrue weighted participation.

depositCoinflip(uint256).notice: Burn BURNIE to increase the caller's coinflip stake, applying quest rewards when eligible.

getActiveQuests().notice: Get the currently active quests for today.

getPlayerQuestView(address).notice: Get comprehensive quest view data for a player.

name().notice: Token name displayed in wallets and explorers.

normalizeActiveBurnQuests().notice: Normalize burn quests mid-day when extermination ends the burn window.

notifyQuestBond(address,uint256).notice: Notify quest module of a bond purchase.

notifyQuestBurn(address,uint32).notice: Notify quest module of an NFT burn.

notifyQuestMint(address,uint32,bool).notice: Notify quest module of a mint action.

playerQuestStates(address).notice: Get a player's quest progress and streak information.

processCoinflipPayouts(uint24,bool,uint2.notice: Progress coinflip payouts for the current level in bounded slices.

rollDailyQuest(uint48,uint256).notice: Roll the daily quest for a given day using VRF entropy.

rollDailyQuestWithOverrides(uint48,uint2.notice: Roll the daily quest with explicit overrides for quest types.

supplyIncUncirculated().notice: Total supply including uncirculated ContractAddresses.VAULT allowance.

totalSupply().notice: Total circulating supply (excludes ContractAddresses.VAULT's virtual allowance).

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer `amount` tokens from `from` to `to` on behalf of caller.

vaultEscrow(uint256).notice: Escrow virtual coin to the ContractAddresses.VAULT (no token movement); increases mint allowance.

vaultMintAllowance().notice: Virtual coin reserved for the ContractAddresses.VAULT (not yet circulating).

vaultMintTo(address,uint256).notice: Mint coin out of the ContractAddresses.VAULT allowance to a recipient.
